body:
+1. It would probably be more efficient to loop over `input_flat(i)` to identify the start and end positions for each label/feature, then use `StringPiece` instead of `string` as the argument to `ConvertHelper<T>()`.

(It would also be fine to iterate on this in a future PR.)
body_html:
+1. It would probably be more efficient to loop over input_flat(i) to identify the start and end positions for each label/feature, then use StringPiece instead of string as the argument to ConvertHelper<T>().

(It would also be fine to iterate on this in a future PR.)
body_text:
+1. It would probably be more efficient to loop over input_flat(i) to identify the start and end positions for each label/feature, then use StringPiece instead of string as the argument to ConvertHelper<T>().
(It would also be fine to iterate on this in a future PR.)
